sections.description:
At Truora we realized that users are using emails to try to keep users in conversion funnels. All this has changed and people are staying in messenger chat, not in emails. How to take advantage of all this to convert quality users?

Truora TruConnect is a tool that allows your create conversations with chatbots for the processes you want. We are based on the messaging chat that people use the most to make processes, reactivate users and improve up to 30% of your growth process.

sections.title: Improve the conversion of your conversation using Whatsapp

items.title: The challenge
items.description: For over 40 years we have been using email to try to keep users in conversion funnels. All this has changed and people are staying in messenger chat, not in emails. How to take advantage of all this to convert quality users?.
list: Extremely easy to create and validate a conversation.
Integrated simulator to review a conversation before deploying it to the entire target.

items.title: Defining the process
items.description: We had 2 stages. The first was to valdiate the idea in its minimum experession. The secord was to have a more complete MVP to go to market with an App to reserve space and then come back to get your car.

items.title: Super fast MVP
list: Design, iteration and development oriented to solve the problem from the root. In love with the solution we achieve.
Our final user test consisted of 10 pilots with different customers and objectives.
